summary: AUTO PARK BRAKING SYSTEM LOCKING UP AND SLAMMING THE VEHICLE TO AN UNINTENDED STOP.  *MR  THE CONSUMER RECEIVED REPLIES FROM OTHER CONSUMERS ALL OVER THE COUNTRY WITH THE SAME PROBLEM.
